summary: The script orchestrates the evaluation of a text classification model using model-parallel (distributed) execution. It loads configuration via Hydra, initializes the NeMo TextClassificationModel, applies a custom NLP distributed strategy, manages experiment logging and checkpoints, and runs the evaluation across multiple GPUs or nodes.
business_intent: Enable users to benchmark and validate large-scale text classification models in a distributed environment, simplifying the setup of model-parallel evaluation for research and production deployments.
